title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1700.5 - Waiver of requirements of this Chapter and use of alternative procedures
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1700.5 - Waiver of requirements of this Chapter and use of alternative procedures

State Regulations

The requirements of this Chapter may be waived if, in the
opinion of the commissioner, their application may be shown to effect undue
hardship or the waiver of such requirements of the use of alternative
procedures are appropriate to the interests of the housing company, the public, the lien holders, the cooperators, or the tenants. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1700.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
